transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, Vinay ji, aawaaz abhi aa rahi hai aawaaz?
Customer: Haan haan. Ab ab aa rahi hai. About us mein jo aapke hmmm hmmm hmmm bataiye.
Executive: Haan. Main aapse keh raha tha ke about us jab hum apne uska kholte hain to usme company image jo hai, wo hume remove karani thi. Uski jagah ye wali jo maine ab aapko bheji hui hai na, wo dalni thi. Bas ye tha.
Executive: Baaki to cold room ya cold store ka maine kuch bhi change nahi karwaya.
Customer: Nahi nahi, company mein to photo aa rahi hai na? To wo wahi photos aati hai jo aapke highlighted jo products hote hai na sab, to wahi photos aa rahi hai. Aur kuch photos mein jaise ye jo aapka product add hai cold storage room door, theek hai? To isme humne kya kiya hai ki humne kya kiya ek door ka hi photo update kar diya. Cold storage room door mein usme photo storage ka photo hona chahiye na sir?
Executive: Ya fir aap wo nahi dekh pa rahe jo hamare paas mein aa raha hai?
Customer: Bhai isme helmet aur ghar var aa rahe the ye.
Executive: Helmet?
Customer: Helmet aa raha hai, laptop aa raha hai, ye dastari aa rahi hai, ye sab ye hai about us mein. Aap ek baar yadi khol sakte hai to usko scroll down kijiye.
Executive: Ek second. Helmet. Ek second sir, main ek minute company check kar rahi hu.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Yes, ek baar aap mujhe ek kaam kijiye, ek baar screenshot leke whatsapp pe dal dijiye, baaki main abhi mujhe dikh gaya hai, main change kar deti hu. Theek hai? Ek baar aap mujhe.
Customer: Abhi wo aapko tab bhi dikh gaya tha, ruk jaiye. Ya to aap wo kar lijiye google wale pe kya hota hai wo google meet.
Executive: Laptop ka photo dikh gaya sir mujhe. Haan haan haan, yahan se change kar lenge company. Jab aap scroll haan, jab aapko scroll down karoge na to company images ke naam se ek wo hai.
Customer: Laptop hai, helmet hai, theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Haan, ye ek do teen char panch che, ye che hatni hai photos. Iski jagah pe ye wale dal jayenge bas.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai sir, theek hai, okay.
Customer: Theek hai?
Executive: Okay, main abhi karti hu.
Customer: Haan, aur ek chahe to ye wala supreme industry ka gate number one wala dal jayega bas.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to remove company image in 'About us'.

- Current images show helmet, laptop, etc.

- Wants to add Supreme Industry gate image.



Resolution:

- Executive found the images to be removed.

- Agreed to change the images.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will change the images.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- images, about us, company, update
